quote_first: She checked her watch yet again:
quote_last: . For the first time she began to feel slightly uneasy. Then suddenly she saw him striding across the platform towards her followed by a man dragging two cases, and a porter wheeling even more luggage.
title: As the Crow Flies
author: Jeffrey Archer

title: The Maltese Falcon
